speaker: Dark Stream
lines: Water runs black as polished stone; it shows the sky where sky can't go.
Fish with lantern eyes hold their breath when you kneel.
A bridge of roots pretends it is not a bridge so you will step wrong.
Coins wink from the silt; each wishes to be the one you take.
A feather floats upstream to see if anyone is watching.
The current speaks in threes and expects you to answer in twos.
A pale woman stands across the water until you blink.
Where she stood is only fog that remembers her outline.

choices.text: Toss a coin and make no wish.
Walk upstream where the fog thins.
